name: STARHOUND (11/15 Pre-Alpha Build)
description:
Thanks for reading! This is the first build of Underdog Studio's debut title "STARHOUND," and represents around a month of work. We are aiming for this to be a mobile co-op arcade shooter and a spin on classic arcade hits like "Time Pilot." Let us know what you think down below!

Credits:

Braden Kovalovich - Programming Lead

Thomas Ludin - Project Manager

Brigitte Lubker - Art Lead

Ethan Whiting - Head of Design
